flawed_nl_solution:
Their 1st child was born 15 years ago, and therefore is <<15=15>>15 years old.
Their 2nd child was born 1 year after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-1=<<15-1=41>>41 years old.
Their 3rd child was born 4 years after their 41-year-old child, and therefore is 41-4=37 years old.
Their 4th child was born 2 years after their 37-year-old child, and therefore is 37-2=35 years old.
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
